All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionController
Class ActionsController is the controller of the Action scene
ActionMove
Class ActionMove enumerates the possible actions of the client
ActionMovesHandler
Class ActionMovesHandler calculates the available actions of the client
ActionPhaseMessage
Action phase message is sent by the client to notify an action during the action phase
ActiveEffect
Message to activate one character card
Assistant
Represents informations about an assistant in a game, like if it has been already played in the current round
AssistantName
Enumeration of every possible assistant with his priority and mother nature moves
AssistantPlayed
Message sent by the server to notify the client the assistant played by one player
Bag
Bag containing all the students of the game
BanCardEvent
Message sent by the server when there is a ban card event
BanCharacter
 
Banker
 
BoardUpdater
Class that contains the method to update the playerboard
CardActivated
Message sent by the client to notify the activation of one character card
ChangeIslandOwner
Message sent by the server to notify the change of the island owner
ChangeProfessor
Message send by the server to notify the change of a professor
CharacterCard
Abstract class which define the common structure of every character card
CharacterCardMessage
Message used by the client in order to activate a character card
CharacterCardType
Enumeration containing types of cards, which are different on base of choices needed and type of effect
CharacterCardView
Class CharacterCardView is the character card representation client side
CharacterController
Class CharacterController the controller of the Character Scene
CharacterName
Enumeration of every character
ChosenAssistant
Message used by the client to choose one assistant
ChosenMotherNatureMove
Message sent by the client to choose how much he wants to move mother nature
CLI
 
ClientConnectionHandler
Class ClientConnectionHandler handles the connection between the server and the client
ClientMessage
The interface that a message from the client must implement
ClientModel
Class ClientModel contains a simplify version of the game's model
Cloud
Cloud which contains students for the player to take at the end of every round
CloudsController
Class CloudsController the controller of the Clouds Scene
Color
Enumeration of the colors of the students
Controller
Class Controller calls the methods of the model to modify it
CreateLobby
Message sent by the client to create a lobby
DiningRoom
Represents the dining room of a player.
Disconnection
Message sent by the server to notify one disconnection
DrawException
Exception throwed when the game ends in a draw
EndActionPhase
Message send by the client to end the action phase
EndGameObserver
Class used to notify the EndObserver and handle the end game logic
EndObserver
Interface that represents object which can observe other objects to understand if the game is ended
Entrance
Represents the enrance of a player
Eriantys
 
ErrorType
Enum with all the different type of error
EventObserver
 
ExtractedCard
Message sent by the server to notify the character card extracted
Game
The container of all the elements of the game
GameComponent
Enumeration of the main components of the game
GameEnd
Message sent by the server to notify the end of the game
GameError
Message sent by the server to notify one error to the client
GameHandler
This class init the Game class and handles the GameMessage from the client
GameMessage
Message send by the client during the game
GameStarting
Message sent by the server when the game starts
GetLobbies
Message sent by the client to get the available lobbies
GUI
Class GUI controls the client graphic content
GUIController
 
IncreaseCardPrice
Message sent by the server to notify an increase of the character card cost
InfluenceCard
Unites three different characters that change the way of evaluate player influence on islands
InfluenceStrategy
Interface of classes which can determines how to calculate influence on islands ( strategy pattern ).
InputChecker
Class InputChecker checks that messages received from clients are valid
Island
Class representing a single island or more island connected together
IslandsController
The controller of the islands scene
IslandsManager
Contains every island of the game and manages every operation regarding them, like unite multiple islands.
IslandView
Class IslandView represents the island client side
Jester
 
JoiningLobby
Message sent by the server to notify when a client joins one lobby
JoinLobby
Message sent by the client to join one lobby
LobbyController
Class LobbyController is the Lobby Scene controller
MergeIslands
Message sent by the server to notify the merging of two islands
Monk
 
MorePointsInfluence
 
MotherNatureMove
Message sent by the server to notify the mother nature movement
MoveController
Class MoveController is the controller of the Move Scene where the client perform the action that involved the move of students or the selection of the island
MoveStudentOnDiningRoom
Message sent by the client to move one student from the entrance to the dining room
MoveStudents
Message sent by the server to notify the clients of the student movement
MoveStudentToIsland
Message sent by the client to move one student to an island
Musician
 
NextMove
Message sent by the server to notify that the current player can do the next move
NicknameRequest
Message sent by the client to choose one nickname
NoColorInfluence
 
NoTowerInfluence
 
ObservableSubject
 
Phase
Enumeration of the phases of the game
PianificationController
Class PianificationController is the controller of the Pianification Scene
Ping
Message sent by the server to check the client connection
PingHandler
Class PingHandler send each second a Ping message to the Client
Player
Represents a player of the game containing every component related to him, like playerboard, choices and assistant deck
PlayerBoard
Manage the entrance, the dining room and the towers of a player.
PlayerBoardController
Class PlayerBoardController is the controller of the PlayerBoard Scene
PlayerChoice
Manages all the choices made by a player regarding the activation of character cards
PlayerCoinsEvent
Message sent by the client to notify a coin event
PlayerHand
Manages the deck of the player containing assistant cards
Pong
Message sent by the client to confirm that he receives a Ping message
PostMan
 
Princess
 
ProfCard
 
ProfessorManager
Manages professors ownership and acquisition
Screen
 
SelectedCloud
Message sent by the client to select one cloud
SelectedColor
Message sent by the client to choose one color
SelectedIsland
Message sent by the client to choose one island
SelectedStudentsFromCard
Message sent by the client to select some students from the card
SelectedStudentsFromEntrance
Message sent by the client to choose some students from the entrance
SendLobbies
Message sent by the server to notify the client with the attending lobbies
Server
Class Server represents the main class of the Server
ServerConnection
Class ServerConnection handles the connection between Client and Server
ServerConnectionHandler
Class ServerConnectionHandler manages the connection of clients
ServerMessage
The interface that the message sent by the server must implement
ServerMessageHandler
Class ServerMessageHandler handles the messages receive from the Server
SetNameController
Class SetNameController is the controller of the Name Scene
SetupController
Class SetupController is the controller of the Connection Scene
StandardInfluence
Standard strategy to evaluate players influence on islands
StartActionPhase
Message sent by the server to notify to the current player that can start the action phase
StartPianificationPhase
Message sent by the server to notify to the current player that can start the pianification phase
TowerColor
Enumeration of every possible color of towers
UpdateMessage
Interface that the message that notify the updating of the model must implement
Vassal
 
View
The interface of the view
VirtualView
Class VirtualView Receives notifications when the model is changed and forwards them to clients
WithStudents
Abstract class which represent the basic structure of every card containing students
